mutants.code:
def calculate_partition_cost(n, a):
    MOD = 998244353
    l = sorted(a)
    tot = sum(l[n:]) - sum(l[:n])
    fact = [1]
    for i in range(1, 2 * n + 1):
        fact.append(fact[-1] * i % MOD)
    tot /= fact[2 * n]
    inv = pow(fact[n], MOD - 3, MOD)
    tot *= inv
    return tot % MOD
